page.title: 16Tollerton School continued
page.content: kitchen staff working in our kitchen. It was built in 1945.A secretary works two half days a week.During the school week we have the following lessons;- Mathematics,English Activities,Writing Practice,Art and Craft,Movement and Drama,Music and Topic Work.We use Radio and Television Schools programmes.All the children use our computer frequently.We visit Alne School in a nearby village for games and swimming as we have no facilitics for these here.We visit York and the surrounding area regularly visiting Museums and other places of interest. We have visited the Yorkshire Museum of Farming,the Yorkshire Museum,the Jorvik Centre and the Castle Museum. Through the year we have a Harvest Festival,Autumn Fayre,Christmas Concert,School Journey,Sports Day and open days for parents.We take our
